mapper.insert: INSERT INTO treview(tnum, snum, content, score) VALUES (#{tnum},#{snum},#{content},#{score})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM treview WHERE tnum = #{tnum}
SELECT num, snum, content, score, treview.created, nickname, picture FROM treview JOIN memberinfo ON treview.snum = memberinfo.userNum WHERE tnum=#{tnum} ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}
SELECT ifnull(avg(score),0) from treview where tnum= #{tnum}
